ralgorithm

Class CombToLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • ralgorithm.Algorithm
      • ralgorithm.CombToLine

  • public class CombToLine
extends Algorithm
    Algorithm to tranform a Combed robot into a line of modules.

    Iterates over all of the blocks in a combed module and OneTunnels them to become a member of the line, after all blocks have been one tunneled to a line then the tranform is done

    Since:
    4/2/2016

      • determinePMove

        public ParallelMove determinePMove()
        Description copied from class: Algorithm
        Determines the next sequence of moves to be run in parallel

        Abstract method to be defined in instance of algorithm that is the essential step for the execution of the algorithm.

        If the method is initilly called in this class then it will be an error, because in an algorithm implementation we want to determine what the pmove is.

        Overrides:
        determinePMove in class Algorithm
        Returns:
        ParallelMove which will be next run in the algorithm
